vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.14.2
§ Shinab = "splendour of the father"
the king of Admah in the time of Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示納 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "父親的光輝"
亞伯拉罕時代的押瑪王 {#創 14:2|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
示纳 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "父亲的光辉"
亚伯拉罕时代的押玛王 {#创 14:2|}
